attributes.action: Allow the Gurkha who holds the Victoria Cross to reside in Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We allow Abu Hamza a known terrorist activator to have an operation for the gangrene on his arm and his family to live on benefits.

This Gurkha who put his life on the line in the second world war should be allowed every ammenity we can offer but we are too busy allowing immigrants into the country to fleece the benefits stystem at the expense of the British person - disguated.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
